display_help: Using powers stolen from Dominatrix, you create a miniature gravitational well at your opponent's location, preventing your movement. The event horizon of this well grows over time, eventually capturing nearby allies who do not flee the area. At its fullest extent, the interior well erupts in a giant burst of energy, dealing significant damage to all targets caught in the field at the moment of the explosion.
display_target_help: You have been trapped by a singularity and cannot escape!

messages.display_victim_hit: You are caught in the gravitational well of the Singularity.
